content: sweet oddity art mini chinese dragon crochet pattern https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart copyright 2024 of sweet oddity art you are not allowed to sell this pattern you are not allowed to distribute or publish this pattern in any form you are not allowed to alter this pattern in any form sweet oddity art 1 pattern details size 7 inches from front of head to back with weight 4 yarn and a 3 25 mm hook skill level needed intermediate- suitable for novice crocheters requires patience and precision when assembling the dragon and basic crochet skills contact info if you have any questions or concerns about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me i will get back to you within 24 hours sweetoddityart@gmail com https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart materials needed yarn worsted weight #4 approximately 75g of main color and 25g of accent colors color a green color b yellow color c orange color d red color e brown hook size d hook or 3 25 mm 12 mm safety eyes scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch f/o= fasten_off single_crochet= single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet sl= slip_stitch flo= front loops only double_crochet= double_crochet stitch inc3= 3 single_crochet in the same stitch bob= bobble stitch increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 head and body crocheted from front of head to back of body with color a chain 4 1 increase in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 4 single_crochet in the last chain working on the opposite side of the chain single_crochet increase= 10 2 single_crochet in each st around 3 single_crochet bob 2 single_crochet bob 5 single_crochet 4 3 single_crochet decrease x 2= 8 5 single_crochet color b chain 11 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across slip_stitch in same st color a 5 single_crochet color b chain 11 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across slip_stitch in same st color a 2 single_crochet 6 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet= 10 7 3 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet= 12 8 4 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet= 14 9-10 single_crochet in each st around *ear chain 7 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 2 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet sl* *horn chain 9 sl in 2nd chain from hook sl 6 single_crochet* 11 5 single_crochet ear single_crochet color d horn slip_stitch in same st color a 4 single_crochet color d horn slip_stitch in same st color a single_crochet ear 3 single_crochet 12 single_crochet in each st around work around the ears and
